message:
SYSTEM: Re-engineer_NOR.pdf: Página 34
Input: Non-Ontological Resource
•
A non-ontological resource holds a term-based thesaurus which 
follows the record-based model.
•
A thesaurus represents the knowledge of a domain with a 
collection of terms and a limited set of relations between them. 
•
The record-based data model is a denormalized structure, it uses 
a record for every term with the information about the term, such 
as synonyms, broader, narrower and related terms.
PR-NOR Example
34
